Saddhañhi uppādetvā dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘saddhā bandhati pātheyya’’nti. ^b^Sirī^eb^ti issariyaṃ. Issariye hi abhimukhībhūte thalatopi jalatopi bhogā āgacchantiyeva. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sirī bhogānamāsayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotī^eb^ti purisassa devaloke, manussaloke ceva nibbānañca gacchantassa saddhā dutiyā hoti, sahāyakiccaṃ sādheti. ^b^Bhattapuṭādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena dutiyikādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Anekasarasatā^eb^ti anekasabhāvatā, anekakiccatā vā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Nagaropamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe suttageyyādidhammaṃ jānātīti ^b^dhammaññū^eb^. Tassa tasseva suttageyyādinā bhāsitassa tadaññassa suttapadatthassa bodhakassa saddassa atthakusalatāvasena atthaṃ jānātīti ^b^atthaññū^eb^. ‘‘Ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāyā’’ti evaṃ yathā attano pamāṇajānanavasena attānaṃ jānātīti ^b^attaññū^eb^. Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogapariyesanavissajjanesu mattaṃ jānātīti ^b^mattaññū^eb^. Niddese pana paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāya eva paribhogādimattaññutā pabodhitā hotīti paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāva dassitā. ‘‘Ayaṃ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṃ kālo yogassa adhigamāyā’’ti evaṃ kālaṃ jānātīti ^b^kālaññū^eb^. Tattha pañca vassāni uddesassa kālo, dasa paripucchāya, idaṃ atisambādhaṃ, atikkhapaññassa tāvatā kālena tīretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ^a^V3.0178^ea^ dasa vassāni uddesassa kālo, vīsati paripucchāya, tato paraṃ yoge kammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Khattiyaparisādikaṃ ^a^M3.0192^ea^ aṭṭhavidhaṃ parisaṃ jānātīti ^b^parisaññū^eb^. Bhikkhuparisādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ, khattiyaparisādikaṃ manussaparisaṃyeva puna catubbidhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ vadanti apare. Niddese panassa khattiyaparisādicatubbidhaparisaggahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ‘‘Imaṃ me sevantassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tasmā ayaṃ puggalo sevitabbo, vipariyāyato añño asevitabbo’’ti sevitabbāsevitabbapuggalaṃ jānātīti ^b^puggalaparoparaññū^eb^. Evañhi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ paroparaṃ ukkaṭṭhanihīnataṃ jānāti nāma. Niddesepissa sevitabbāsevitabbapuggale vibhāvanameva samaṇakathākatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Dhammaññūsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^69-70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^patitapalāso^eb^ti patitapatto. Ettha paṭhamaṃ paṇḍupalāsataṃ, dutiyaṃ pannapalāsatañca vatvā tatiyaṃ jālakajātatā, catutthaṃ khārakajātatā ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttā. ^b^Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.294) imameva pāḷiṃ āharitvā dassentena paṭhamaṃ paṇḍupalāsataṃ, dutiyaṃ pannapalāsatañca vatvā tatiyaṃ khārakajātatā, catutthaṃ jālakajātatā ca dassitā. Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ – ‘‘pāricchattake pupphamāne ekaṃ vassaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti, te tassa paṇḍupalāsabhāvato paṭṭhāya attamanā honti. Yathāha –

[08]Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako koviḷāro, paṇḍupalāso hoti, attamanā, bhikkhave, devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako, koviḷāro, na cirasseva pannapalāso bhavissatī’ti. Yasmiṃ samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako, koviḷāro, pannapalāso hoti, jālakajāto hoti, khārakajāto hoti, kuṭumalakajāto hoti, korakajāto hoti, attamanā, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0193^ea^, devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘korakajāto dāni pāricchattako koviḷāro, na cirasseva sabbapāliphullo bhavissatī’ti.

[03]^b^Līnatthappakāsiniyampi^eb^^a^V3.0179^ea^ (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.294) ettha evamattho dassito – ^b^pannapalāso^eb^ti patitapatto. ^b^Khārakajāto^eb^ti jātakhuddakamakuḷo. Ye hi nīlapattakā ativiya khuddakā makuḷā, te ‘‘khārakā’’ti vuccanti. ^b^Jālakajāto^eb^ti tehiyeva khuddakamakuḷehi jātajālako sabbaso jālo viya jāto. Keci pana ‘‘jālakajātoti ekajālo viya jāto’’ti atthaṃ vadanti. Pāricchattako kira khārakaggahaṇakāle sabbatthakameva pallaviko hoti, te cassa pallavā pabhassarapavāḷavaṇṇasamujjalā honti. Tena so sabbaso samujjalanto tiṭṭhati. ^b^Kuṭumalajāto^eb^ti sañjātamahāmakuḷo. ^b^Korakajāto^eb^ti sañjātasūcibhedo sampativikasamānāvattho. ^b^Sabbapāliphullo^eb^ti sabbaso phullitavikasitoti. Ayañca anukkamo dīghabhāṇakānaṃ vaḷañjanānukkamena dassito, na ettha ācariyassa virodho āsaṅkitabbo.

[03]^b^Kantanakavāto^eb^ti devānaṃ puññakammapaccayā pupphānaṃ chindanakavāto. ^b^Kantatī^eb^ti chindati. ^b^Sampaṭicchanakavāto^eb^ti chinnānaṃ chinnānaṃ pupphānaṃ sampaṭiggaṇhakavāto. ^b^Cinanto^eb^ti nānāvidhabhattisannivesavasena nicinaṃ karonto. ^b^Aññataradevatāna^eb^nti nāmagottavasena apaññātadevatānaṃ. ^b^Reṇuvaṭṭī^eb^ti reṇusaṅghāto. ^b^Kaṇṇikaṃ āhaccā^eb^ti sudhammāya kūṭaṃ āhantvā.

[03]^b^Anupharaṇānubhāvo^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno kittisaddassa yāva brahmalokā anupharaṇasaṅkhāto ānubhāvo. ^b^Pabbajjānissitaṃ hotī^eb^ti pabbajjāya catupārisuddhisīlampi dassitamevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Paṭhamajjhānasannissita^eb^ntiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Idha pana ubhayato paricchedo heṭṭhā sīlato upari arahattato ca paricchedassa dassitattā. ^b^Tenetaṃ vutta^eb^nti tena kāraṇena etaṃ ‘‘catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pabbajjānissitaṃ hotī’’tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Pāricchattakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^a^M3.0194^ea^^b^atthassa asādhikā^eb^ ‘‘bhāvanaṃ ananuyuttassā’’ti vuttattā. ^b^Sambhāvanatthe^eb^ti ‘‘api nāma evaṃ siyā’’ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho. ^b^Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hotī^eb^ti ekameva saṅkhaṃ avatvā aparāya saṅkhāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti yathā ‘‘dve vā ^a^V3.0180^ea^ tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī’’ti. ^b^Sammā adhisayitānī^eb^ti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayapariharaṇatthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni. Upariattho hettha adhi-saddo. ^b^Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā^eb^ti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘usmīkatānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sammā paribhāvitānī^eb^ti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānī’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca sammāparisedanaṃ kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanañca sammāadhisayanasammāparisedananipphattiyā ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammāadhisayaneneva hi itaradvayaṃ ijjhati. Na hi sammāadhisayanato visuṃ sammāparisedanassa sammāparibhāvanassa ca kāraṇaṃ atthi. Tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tividhakiriyākaraṇenā^eb^ti sammāadhisayanāditividhakiriyākaraṇenāti attho. Kiñcāpi ‘‘evaṃ aho vata me’’tiādinā na icchā uppajjeyya kāraṇassa pana sampāditattā, atha kho bhabbāva te abhinibbhijjitunti yojanā. Kasmā bhabbāti āha ^b^‘‘te hi yasmā tāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sayampī^eb^ti aṇḍāni. ^b^Pariṇāma^eb^nti paripākaṃ bahinikkhamanayogyataṃ. Yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti ālokassa anto paññāyamānato sayañca paripākagatattā.

[03]^b^Opammasampaṭipādana^eb^nti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti upameyyatthena saṃsandetvā saha yojetvā. Sampādanena sampayuttadhammavasena ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo veditabbo. Ñāṇassa hi sabhāvato satinepakkato ca tikkhabhāvo, samādhivasena kharabhāvo, saddhāvasena vippasannabhāvo. ^b^Pariṇāmakālo^eb^ti balavavipassanākālo. ^b^Vaḍḍhikālo^eb^ti ^a^M3.0195^ea^ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanākālo. Anulomaṭṭhāniyā hi vipassanā gahitagabbhā nāma tadā maggagabbhassa gahitattā. ^b^Tajjātika^eb^nti tassa vipassanānuyogassa anurūpaṃ. Satthāpi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati, desanāpi vineyyasantānagataṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati, yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na deti.

[03]^b^Olambakasaṅkhāta^eb^nti olambakasuttasaṅkhātaṃ. ‘‘Pala’’nti hi tassa suttassa nāmaṃ. ^b^Cāretvā^eb^ dāruno heṭṭhā dosajānanatthaṃ ussāpetvā. ^b^Gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍo^eb^ti etena ‘‘palena gaṇḍahāro palagaṇḍoti pacchimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso’’ti dasseti. ^b^Gahaṇaṭṭhāne^eb^ti hatthena gahetabbaṭṭhāne ^a^V3.0181^ea^. Sammadeva khipīyanti etena kāyaduccaritādīnīti saṅkhepo, pabbajjāva saṅkhepo ^b^pabbajjāsaṅkhepo^eb^. Tena vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassa puggalassa ajānantasseva āsavānaṃ parikkhayo idha vipassanānisaṃsoti adhippeto.

[03]^b^Hemantikena^eb^ kāraṇabhūtena, bhummatthe vā etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, hemantiketi attho. ^b^Paṭippassambhantī^eb^ti paṭippassaddhaphalāni honti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pūtikāni bhavantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ^eb^ agādhagambhīrabhāvato. ^b^Nāvā viya yogāvacaro^eb^ mahoghuttarato. ^b^Pariyāyanaṃ viyā^eb^ti parito aparāparaṃ yāyanaṃ viya. ^b^Khajjamānāna^eb^nti khādantena viya udakena khepiyamānabandhanānaṃ. ^b^Tanubhāvo^eb^ti pariyuṭṭhānapavattiyā asamatthatāya dubbalabhāvo. ^b^Vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehī^eb^ti vipassanāñāṇasamuṭṭhitehi pītipāmojjehi. ^b^Okkhāyamāne^eb^ti vipassanākammaṭṭhāne vīthippaṭipāṭiyā okkhāyamāne, paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya vā ^b^okkhāyamāne^eb^. Saṅkhārupekkhāya ^b^pakkhāyamāne. Dubbalatā dīpitā^eb^ ‘‘appakasireneva saṃyojanāni paṭippassambhanti, pūtikāni bhavantī’’ti vuttattā.
[06]Bhāvanāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^72-73^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^passatha nū^eb^ti api passatha. ^b^Mahanta^eb^nti vipulaṃ. ^b^Aggikkhandha^eb^nti aggisamūhaṃ. ^b^Āditta^eb^nti padittaṃ. ^b^Sampajjalita^eb^nti samantato pajjalitaṃ accivipphuliṅgāni ^a^M3.0196^ea^ muñcantaṃ. ^b^Sajotibhūta^eb^nti samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtaṃ. ^b^Taṃ kiṃ maññathā^eb^ti taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pucchati. Yadettha satthā aggikkhandhāliṅganaṃ kaññāliṅganañca ānesi, tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘ārocayāmī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Dussīlassā^eb^ti nissīlassa sīlavirahitassa. ^b^Pāpadhammassā^eb^ti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvassa. ^b^Asucisaṅkassarasamācārassā^eb^ti aparisuddhatāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācārassa. Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā ‘‘idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī’’ti paresaṃ āsaṅkā hoti. Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā ‘‘kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī’’ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro ^a^V3.0182^ea^. ^b^Paṭicchannakammantassā^eb^ti lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakammantassa. ^b^Assamaṇassā^eb^ti na samaṇassa. Salākaggahaṇādīsu ‘‘ahampi samaṇo’’ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^samaṇapaṭiññassa^eb^. Aseṭṭhacāritāya ^b^abrahmacārissa^eb^. Uposathādīsu ‘‘ahampi brahmacārī’’ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^brahmacāripaṭiññassa^eb^. Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā ^b^antopūtikassa^eb^. Chadvārehi rāgādikilesānussavanena tintattā ^b^avassutassa^eb^. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca ^b^kasambujātassa^eb^.

[03]^b^Vālarajjuyā^eb^ti vālehi katarajjuyā. Sā hi kharatarā hoti. ^b^Ghaṃseyyā^eb^ti mathanavasena ghaṃseyya. ^b^Teladhotāyā^eb^ti telena nisitāya. ^b^Paccorasmi^eb^nti patiurasmiṃ, abhimukhe uramajjheti adhippāyo. ^b^Ayosaṅkunā^eb^ti saṇḍāsena. ^b^Pheṇuddehaka^eb^nti pheṇaṃ uddehetvā uddehetvā, anekavāraṃ pheṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvāti attho. Evamettha saṅkhepato pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā. Navamaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Aggikkhandhopamasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^paritta^eb^nti ittaraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appaṃ thoka’’^eb^nti. Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo idha jīvitassa raso kiccanti adhippetanti āha ^a^M3.0197^ea^^b^‘‘sarasaparittatāyapī’’^eb^ti. Tadadhīnavuttitāyapi hi ‘‘yo, bhikkhave, ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo’’ti vacanato parittaṃ ^b^khaṇaparittatāyapi^eb^. Paramatthato hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittakkhaṇappavattimattoyeva. Yathā nāma rathacakkaṃ pavattamānampi ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati, tiṭṭhamānampi ekeneva tiṭṭhati, evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte satto niruddhoti vuccati. Yathāha ‘‘atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati. Anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha na jīvati jīvissati. Paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha jīvati na jīvissati.
[21]‘‘Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
[22]Ekacittasamāyuttā, lahuso vattate khaṇo.
[21]‘‘Ye ^a^V3.0183^ea^ niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha;
[22]Sabbepi sadisā khandhā, gatā appaṭisandhikā.
[21]‘‘Anibbattena na jāto, paccuppannena jīvati;
[22]Cittabhaṅgā mato loko, paññatti paramatthiyā’’ti. (mahāni. 10);

[03]^b^Lahusa^eb^nti lahukaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘lahuṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanato lahusa’’nti. ^b^Parittaṃ lahusa^eb^nti ubhayaṃ panetaṃ appakassa vevacanaṃ. Yañhi appakaṃ, taṃ parittañceva lahukañca hoti. Idha pana āyuno adhippetattā rassanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Mantāya^eb^nti karaṇatthe etaṃ bhummavacananti āha ^b^‘‘mantāya boddhabbaṃ, paññāya jānitabbanti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mantāya^eb^nti vā manteyyanti vuttaṃ hoti, mantetabbaṃ mantāya upaparikkhitabbanti attho. ^b^Paññāya jānitabba^eb^nti jānitabbaṃ jīvitassa parittabhāvo bahudukkhādibhāvo. Jānitvā ca pana sabbapalibodhe chinditvā kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ. Yasmā itthi jātassa amaraṇaṃ, appaṃ vā bhiyyo vassasatato upari appaṃ aññaṃ vassasataṃ appatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati, evaṃdīghāyuko pana atidullabho. ‘‘Asuko hi evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatī’’ti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hoti. Tattha visākhā upāsikā vīsasataṃ jīvati, tathā pokkharasātibrāhmaṇo, brahmāyubrāhmaṇo, bāvariyabrāhmaṇo, ānandatthero, mahākassapattheroti ^a^M3.0198^ea^. Anuruddhatthero pana vassasatañceva paṇṇāsañca vassāni. Bākulatthero vassasatañceva saṭṭhi ca vassāni, ayaṃ sabbadīghāyuko, sopi dve vassasatāni na jīvi.
[06]Arakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Mahāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^75-82^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhamassa ^a^V3.0184^ea^ paṭhamaṃ dutiyañca uttānatthameva. Tatiye ^b^vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito^eb^ lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti. Alajjī (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.45) hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti, saṅghabhedampi saṅgharājimpi uppādeti. Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti, satthusāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā ṭhapeti. Evaṃ yo lajjī, so vinayaṃ ajahanto avokkamantova lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti patiṭṭhito.

[03]^b^Asaṃhīro^eb^ti ettha ^b^saṃhīro^eb^ nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati, saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati, taṃ taṃ anujānāti, sakavādaṃ chaḍḍetvā paravādaṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati, ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya ‘‘evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma, evaṃ no ācariyā vadantī’’ti vissajjeti. Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati ^b^asaṃhīro^eb^. Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati, taṃ taṃ nānujānāti, attanā suvinicchinitaṃ katvā gahitaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ na ^a^M3.0199^ea^ vissajjeti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na sakkoti gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetu’’^eb^nti. Catutthādīni suviññeyyāni.
[06]Paṭhamavinayadharasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^83^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^vivekaṭṭho^eb^ti vivitto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dūrībhūto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Satiavippavāse ṭhito^eb^ti kammaṭṭhāne ^a^V3.0185^ea^ satiṃ avijahitvā ṭhito. ^b^Pesitatto^eb^ti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṃ pesitacitto tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro.
[06]Satthusāsanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^84^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame adhikarīyanti etthāti ^b^adhikaraṇāni^eb^. Ke adhikarīyanti? Samathā. Kathaṃ adhikarīyanti? Samanavasena. Tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti āha ^b^‘‘adhikaraṇāni samentī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Uppannānaṃ uppanāna^eb^nti uṭṭhitānaṃ uṭṭhitānaṃ. ^b^Samathattha^eb^nti samanatthaṃ. ^b^Dīghanikāye saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyampi^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.331) ^b^vitthāratoyevā^eb^ti etthāyaṃ vitthāranayo – adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo, idaṃ ^b^vivādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca, idaṃ ^b^anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. Mātikāyaṃ āgatā pañca, vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā, idaṃ ^b^āpattādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ, idaṃ ^b^kiccādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ tasmiṃyeva ^a^M3.0200^ea^ vā, aññatra vūpasametuṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā, yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ, tattha saṅghena vā, saṅghe vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati. Evaṃ sammamāne ca panetasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā, ayaṃ ^b^sammukhāvinayo^eb^ nāma. Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhibhāvo ^b^saṅghasammukhatā^eb^. Sametabbassa vatthuno bhūtattā ^b^dhammasammukhatā^eb^. Yathā taṃ sametabbaṃ, tathevassa samanaṃ ^b^vinayasammukhatā^eb^. Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ atthapaccatthikānaṃ sammukhībhāvo ^b^puggalasammukhatā^eb^. Ubbāhikāya vūpasame panettha saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. Evaṃ tāva sammukhāvinayeneva sammati.

[03]Sace panevampi na sammati, atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū ‘‘na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu’’nti ^a^V3.0186^ea^ saṅghasseva niyyātenti. Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati, tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya parisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti, evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Tattha sammukhāvinayo vuttanayo eva. Yaṃ pana yebhuyyasikākammassa karaṇaṃ, ayaṃ yebhuyyasikā nāma. Evaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati.

[03]Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati, tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā, sace atthi ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinayalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre ‘‘saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti’’nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno ‘‘ummattakena ^a^M3.0201^ea^ me, āvuso, etaṃ kataṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī’’ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati, saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti. Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa ‘‘sacāyaṃ acchinnamūlo bhavissati, sammā vattitvā osāraṇaṃ labhissati. Sace chinnamūlo, ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī’’ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati.

[03]Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. Tassa sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi. Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno ^a^V3.0187^ea^ santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, tesaṃ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhato. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati. Yaṃ panettha ‘‘ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno’’ti ca ‘‘passasī’’ti ca ‘‘āma, passāmī’’ti ca paṭiññātāya ‘‘āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī’’ti karaṇaṃ, taṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. Saṅghādisese parivāsādiyācanā paṭiññā, parivāsādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma.

[03]Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne ‘‘sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṃvatteyyā’’ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati. Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā ‘‘na metaṃ khamatī’’ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā ‘‘dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma’’nti ^a^M3.0202^ea^ na ukkoṭenti, niddampi okkantā honti, sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti. Evaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati.

[03]Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva. Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti. Tena vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
